Question
========

Two pure dice are rolled. Determine the event *A*: an even number comes up on top of one die and odd on the other. What is then the probability of the complement of *A*, or
$\bar{A}$?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2
* 2/3
* 3/4
* 5/6

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2: Incorrect
* 2/3: Incorrect
* 3/4: Correct
* 5/6: Incorrect
